original:
Netocracy is a term coined by the editorial board of the American technology magazine 
The term was later elaborated upon by Alexander Bard and Jan Söderqvist in their book 
In their framework, Bard and Söderqvist also introduce the notion of an underclass, which they term the "consumtariat." This term, a combination of "consumer" and "proletariat," describes a new underclass whose primary activity revolves around consumption, often reg
